TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CivicAddress extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a civic address.

summary.span: 實體地址可以包含如街道地址、郵遞區號、省份及國家或地區等欄位。

span.span: A civic address can include fields such as street address, postal code, state/province, and country or region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實體地址的位置可以取自所使用的類別，實作。A civic address for a location can be obtained from a by using a class that implements . 類別會提供預設實作會傳回對應至實體地址，如果位置來源，提供兩者協調資料，以及實體地址資料。The class provides a default implementation that returns the civic address that corresponds to a , if the location source provides both coordinate data as well as civic address data. 傳回目前位置。 returns a for the current location. 如果位置來源無法解析實體地址，座標位置會傳回。If the location source is unable to resolve the coordinate position to a civic address, is returned. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何解決從位置同步。The following example shows how to resolve a from a location synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何解決從位置以非同步的方式。The following example shows how to resolve a from a location asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/cs/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/vb/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#1)]
